p: The triterpenoids oleanolic acid and ursolic acid are abundant in the plant kingdom, may be effective against HCV by reducing HCV NS5B RdRp virulence [ 74], and can also inhibit enterovirus 71 replication [ 75]. Lastly, Sambucus nigra L. is an active ingredient in a standardized elderberry extract, effectively used in the treatment of fever, colds, and influenza A and B [ 76â€“ 78].
